contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 17, 2019 D Brass In Concert
Brass In Concert 0 Entertainments Contest Brass In Concert brass-in-concert
Sage Gateshead, Gateshead, Tyne and Wear, England, UK Adjudicators - Music: Ian Bousfield, Nick Grace, - Programme Content: Jeremy Wise, - Entertainment & Presentation: Chris Jeans, Mike Lovatt, - Soloist and Individual Awards: Les Neish
Banks Group Trophy (Quality of Performance): Cory
Gateshead Metropolitan Borough Council Trophy (best Entertainment and Presentation): Cory Best Programme Content: Cory Audience Entertainment Trophy: Friary Brass Band Geoffrey Whitham Trophy (best Soloist): Kirsty Abbotts (Cornet, Carlton Main Frickley Colliery) Cyril Beere Memorial Trophy (best new Composition or Arrangement): Cory (playing La Suerte de los Tontos (J. J. Richards, arr. Philip Harper))
Harry Mortimer Trophy (best Principal Cornet): Tom Hutchinson (Cory) Gateshead MBC Trophy (best Soprano Cornet): Steve Stewart (Cory) Thomas Bulmer Memorial Trophy (best Euphonium): Chris Robertson (Brighouse & Rastrick) Don Lusher Trophy (best Trombone): Isobel Daws (Friary Brass Band) FESA Trophy (best Flugel): Danny Winder (Tredegar) Gordon Higginbottom Trophy (best Horn): Zoe Wright (Hammonds Saltaire) North of England Regional Committee Trophy (best Baritone): Ben Stratford (Tredegar) John Fletcher Trophy (best Basses): Brighouse & Rastrick Louis and Colin Johnson Memorial Trophy (best Percussion): Cory Dougie Grieve Trophy (youngest Player): Harry Porthouse, age 15 (Tredegar)
Oct. 26, 2019, 2:36 p.m. Nov. 19, 2019, 3:14 p.m.
